creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: circle of round wire open at one end to go through ear with curlicue at other end; circle has portion where wire is curved in on itself; a flat leaf shaped piece dangles from this portion; flat surface has floral-like pattern with border of half circles; other side of leaf piece is undecorated; both may be left earrings
title: Pair of Earrings
